data.title: Thomasville Times Enterprise
data.meta_description: Search Obituaries in Thomasville Times Enterprise - a space for sharing memories: search for life stories, milestones, guestbook entries, and celebrate life of your loved ones.
data.text:
Phyllis Powers

Phyllis Barbara Graham Powers, beloved mother and grandmother, died peacefully at the Langdale Hospice Home in Valdosta, GA on August 26th, 2024. She was 85 years old.

A funeral Mass will be held on September 4th at St. Pius X Catholic Church in Conyers, GA, followed by a burial at the Monastery of the Holy...

William Gilmer

William Gerald "Gerry" Gilmer passed away in Thomasville, Georgia, on August 9th, 2024, at the age of 79. Gerry was one of six children born to William Bryan Gilmer and Frances Young Gilmer. Gerry's large military family moved often following his father's service through Texas, Georgia, and Florida. He spent his...

Connie Currie

Connie Marie Currie (Lewis), a cherished mother, grandmother, great-grandmother, and a dedicated nurse, passed away on August 21, 2024, in Thomasville, GA, at the age of 60. Born on June 27, 1964, in Panama City, FL, Connie was a formidable presence, living her life with the motto "Faith over fear."

Connie embarked...

Betty toole

Betty George Williams Toole was born on September 30, 1932 and joined her husband and love of her life in heaven on August 25, 2024.

Born and raised in Leesburg, Florida, she attended Centre College and UNC-Chapel Hill where she was a member of the Kappa Delta sorority. She was introduced to Richard Toole in...

Lela McRory

Lela McRory, 84 of Thomasville passed away on August 22, 2024. She was born on November 18, 1939, in Thomasville to the late Lawton and Mattie Wilkes.

Lela was a woman of deep faith and a member of Victory Baptist Church. She loved her family and spending time with them.

She is survived by her sons Robert McRory of...

Sharon Johnson

Sharon Ann was born in Charleston, SC, and adopted by Harold and Edna Maison. She studied English literature at the University of Florida in the 1960s, where she met and married her future husband Loys F. Johnson.

She had a passion for studying the Bible and enjoyed all things British, horses, and genealogy, a...

William Gerald Gilmer

William Gerald "Gerry" Gilmer passed away in Thomasville, Georgia, on August 9th, 2024, at the age of 79.

Charlie Thomas Griffin

Charlie Thomas Griffin, 75 of Ochlocknee Georgia, peacefully entered the Kingdom of Heaven on August 16, 2024, surrounded by family.

Charlie was born on May 4, 1949, to Thomas Otto Griffin and Francis Bryant Griffin Hicks.

Charlie loved the Lord and shared his desire that others would know the peace that comes in...

Dorothy McDuffie

Dorothy Vinzant Griffin McDuffie, 88 of Crawfordville, FL went home to be with her Lord and Savior on Thursday, August 8th, 2024.

She was born in Tallahassee, FL to Avery Lonnie Vinzant, Sr and Vennie Burns Vinzant. First married to Glenn Griffin, with whom she had 4 children and later married to Herman McDuffie....

Colonel Gene Davis

Colonel Gene C. Davis, (Retired) U.S. Army, passed away peacefully on Sunday, August 11, 2024, with his beloved wife Katherine by his side. He was 91 years old. He was preceded in death by his wife of over 60 years, Millie K. Davis.

Born and raised in Carthage, Tennessee, Gene graduated from Tennessee Tech and was...

Ronald Smith, Jr.

Ronald L. Smith, Jr, 52, of Ochlocknee, better known as Ronnie, passed away on August 8, 2024.

A celebration of life will be held at Allen & Allen Funeral Home on Monday, August 12, 2024 at 2 pm.

Ronnie was born on July 18, 1972, in Americus, Georgia, to Ronald L Sr, who survives, and Brenda Smith, who preceded him...

Sandra Day

Sandra "Sandy" Day, born on August 20, 1949, in Rochester, NY, passed away on July 29, 2024, in Thomasville, Georgia. Sandy is survived by her loving siblings, sisters Susan and Cheryl, and brothers Joseph and Robert.

Sandy was known for her deep affection for her pets, including her cherished dog, conure parrot,...

Bessie Pearl Dickerson Newell

Bessie Pearl Dickerson Newell, 79, of Thomasville, passed away on Sunday - August 4, 2024 at Harborview Thomasville.

Bessie was born in Thomasville, GA on December 31, 1944 to the late Charlie Lamb and Bessie Mae Pope.

She married James Willard Newell on November 4, 1983, who survives in Thomasville. She worked...

Rosa Jeanette Tucker Stephens

Rosa Jeanette Tucker Stephens, 91, of Thomasville, passed away on Friday, August 2, 2024 at South Georgia Medical Center.

Funeral Services were held at The Connection Assembly of God on Sunday - August 4, 2024 at 2:00 pm, officiated by Pastor Jason Puckett, and remarks by Reverend Michael Nichols. Interment...

Patricia Marr Palmer

Patricia Marr Palmer, 81, of Thomasville, passed away on Saturday - August 3, 2024 at her residence.

Funeral Services will be held at Whiddon Shiver Funeral Home on Wednesday - August 7, 2024 at 10:00 am with Woody Sanders officiating. Interment will follow at Laurel Hill Cemetery.

Patricia was born in Camden...

Charlie Wright, Jr.

Charlie Betts Wright Jr, age 75, of Talking Rock, Georgia passed away Wednesday, July 3, 2024 at Wildwood Health Care. Charlie was born on June 19, 1949 to Charlie and Mary Wright in Thomasville, Georgia.

Charlie was a member of Jasper United Methodist Church. Charlie was an active member in the Pickens County...

Kerry Brinson

Kerry Lynn Brinson, 63 of Thomasville passed away at home after a brief illness on July 30th 2024. He was born in Thomasville on September 17,1960 to the late Malvin Brinson and Mary Fallon Brinson.

He is survived by his wife Tracie Morgan Brinson, stepdaughter Taylor Froede (Florian), grandchildren Lukas Froede and...

Charles Lavon Griner

We mournfully announce the passing of Charles Lavon Griner, 71, of Thomasville, GA. He passed away on July 30, 2024 at Archbold Memorial Hospital surrounded by his loved ones. Charles was born on May 25, 1953 to Willard Gordon Griner and Annie Teal in Thomasville, GA. Charles and former spouse Valerie had two...

Martha Francis Tony Sterzoy

Martha Francis Toney Sterzoy, 88, of Thomasville, GA, passed away on Tuesday - July 30th, 2024 at Cobblestone Rehab & Healthcare in Moultrie, GA.

A Memorial Service will be held at Gatlin Creek Baptist Church on Saturday - August 3, 2024 at 3:00 P.M.

Martha was born on July 7, 1936 in Clear Creek, WV, to the late...

Eulis "Cotton" Jordan

Mr. Eulis "Cotton" Jordan of Lee, FL passed away on July 25, 2024 after a lengthy illness at his home surrounded by his wife and children. Cotton was born March 2, 1935, in Autryville, GA to John and Jewel Johnson Jordan. He resided with his family in Madison County, FL for the last 58 years. Cotton retired after a...

Ann Ryan Womble

Ann Ryan Pafford Womble, was born December 11, 1930, in Prentise County, MS. She was the daughter of the late Clarence Ryan and Lizzie Boren Ryan. Her family moved to Georgia in 1936 where she lived in Brooks and Thomas County the remainder of her life. She attended Boston High School and was a graduate of the first...

Ruby Edwards

Ruby Lee Edwards, 77, of Camilla died Tuesday, July 23, 2024 at Tift Regional Medical Center in Tifton.

Funeral services were held at 11:00 a.m. Saturday, July 27, 2024 at Pleasant Hill Baptist Church with interment held in the church cemetery. Rev. Robert Lewis and Rev. Jerry Norris will officiated.
